name: Space Odyssey (itch) (Casper)
description:
A game for the GMTK game jam 2022, where you movement gets decided by the roll of a dice.

You are out on mission in space, but your navigation broke. You have no idea where your home planet is, and you need to find you way back. On your way back you face countless situations. Your resources, money, strength and fame, can help you survive challenging situations, but be careful not to use them too quickly.

For some of the art I adapted images from NASA's image library. https://images.nasa.gov and I used icons from https://game-icons.net/
